posts.post_title: FS/FT T206 Ty Cobb (Bat On Shoulder) PSA 4
posts.post_content:

I will also consider trades involving other T206 Cobbs (Green/Red Portrait, Bat Off). Please email [url]wiseguycards@gmail.com[/url] or shoot me a PM if you are interested or have any other questions. 

•T206 Ty Cobb Bat On Shoulder SC 350/30 PSA 4 $10500

Website: [url]www.wiseguysportscards.com[/url]
That's a beautiful card.  The price of T206 Cobbs have run away from my budget, but I would have been all over this 5 years ago.  Good luck with your sale
